qlearning
Class StockageNN

java.lang.Object
  qlearning.StockageNN
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Rangement
Direct Known Subclasses:
StockageNNSingle
public class StockageNN
extends Object
implements Rangement

Memorizing Q(s,a) in a neural network. Each experience is trasnformed into a Sample
At some moments, the Samples gathered into a Dataset are fed into a neural network, which is asked to learn Q(s,a) from this dataset.
When asked to return a Q(s,a) value, this class uses the neural network to compute it.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)
